name: Meowria of Catlomocy
quote: Was the most useful building at the start of LolCat Kingdom they emidietly created diplomocy and there are three groups  the one in which Caton IV is, then second party is General Meownir and in third one is Mr. Gatoren. Caton IV is more decides what will better for country, then party of General Meownir who controls army and tactics next moves and finnally Mr. Gatoren, he's like to make researh and science boom!

civilopediaText.text: Control center Meria Deplomocy etc, gives you MarCat which upgraded version of Market. The first wonder in civiliztion
